item.description:
If you love MMMMM (MusicMakers Monday Morning Music Meetup) and want something more, here is a great class for you and your little one!

Ages birth-5years 11 months
45 minutes per week
Includes a lovely CD

$44 child; $34 siblings
Save $5 as a Greater Hartford Area Parents Meetup Group Member!!! (Be sure to state this when registering)

MusicMakers Academy is offering a 3 week Music and Movement Class (just like the MMMMM but longer) in December.

Classes are offered on:
Monday evenings at 6:15pm (November 30, December 7, December 14)
Tuesday mornings at 9:30am (December 1, 8, 15)
Wednesday mornings at 9:30am (December 2, 9, 16)
Thursday Evenings at 6pm (December 3, 10, 17)

To register, go to http://www.themusiccl...
Go to "locations"
Choose "Greater Hartford"
Use the pull down menu in the center of the screen to show "Rainbow 2009"
You will see the list of classes offered
Choose the class you want
Follow the prompts to pay either using a credit card online OR sending in a check
***Indicate in the customer notes section that you are a Greater Hartford Area Parents Meetup Member. We will see this before charging your card, and will make the $5 discount. If sending in a check, send in your check for the tuition total minus $5.

Want to see a sample class before registering? Click Here

Questions? Contact Paula on the meetup site, or call her at 860-646-3096; email her directly at paulap@musicmakersacademy.com.

group.name: The Greater Hartford Area Parents Meetup Group

item.name: Dec 3, 10, 17: Birth-5 "Rainbow" Music & Movement Class
